title: New: Shlohmo – Later
body:
Fuck me, when **[Shlohmo](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17427-new-lol-boys-changes-shlohmo-remix/ "New: LOL Boys – Changes (Shlohmo Remix)")** goes hard, he really goes hard. _Later_ is the first tune to drop from his upcoming _Laid Out_ EP, due out on **Friends of Friends** on March 5. Centered around a cut throat vocal sample that tears away at the ear, carving and shredding until some sort of sonic beauty emerges, the track achieves something centered and dramatic, but manages to do it in the funnest way possible. It’s an ecstatic overdoss for the senses.

01 DON’T SAY NO (FEAT. HOW TO DRESS WELL)  
02 OUT OF HAND  
03 LATER  
04 PUT IT  
05 WITHOUT

Centered around a cut throat vocal sample that tears away at the ear, carving and shredding until some sort of sonic beauty emerges, \[…\]
